name: Gangplank
title: the Saltwater Scourge

P.name: Trial by Fire

effects.description: Innate: Gangplank periodically empowers his next basic attack to burn the target, dealing them[ 5.5 − 22.5 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) bonus true damage every 0.25 seconds over 2.5 seconds. ][ 55 − 225 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) bonus true damage over 2.5 seconds. ] Turrets receive 50% reduced damage.

If Gangplank successfully hits a target with Trial by Fire, he gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Every time a Powder Keg explodes, the cooldown for Trial by Fire resets and Gangplank gains its bonus movement speed.
Trial by Fire cannot be applied with Parrrley nor Powder Keg.

P.notes:
Unlike most damage over time debuffs, reapplying Trial by Fire before a previous application has run out will stack the full damage, instead of just refreshing the duration.
 𝐏𝐄𝐍𝐃𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐓𝐄𝐒𝐓 : Interaction with parries ( dodge,  block, and  blind).
If the attack is  dodged, the effect is not applied nor does Trial by Fire go on cooldown.
P.blurb: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

Q.name: Parrrley

effects.description: Active: Gangplank shoots the target enemy with his pistol, dealing them physical damage upon the bullet's arrival and applying on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
Parrrley can critically strike for (75% + 35%) AD bonus physical damage.
If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders gold and Silver Serpents, the latter of which can be spent to upgrade Cannon Barrage.

Q.notes:
Parrrley deals  basic damage, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0  spell damage.
 On-hit effects that deal area of effect damage will allow Parrrley to plunder from every enemy killed. This includes enemies killed by Gangplank's  Powder Kegs when activated by Parrrley.
Q.blurb: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.

W.name: Remove Scurvy

effects.description: Active: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, cleansing himself from all crowd control and healing himself.

W.notes:
Remove Scury does not remove  debuffs other than  crowd control, even if both occur from the same effect. For example, Remove Scurvy will dispel the  slow from  Exhaust, but not its damage reduction.
Remove Scurvy can remove the underlying  stun from  airborne, but a  blink or  dash ability is required to override the displacement.
W.blurb: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.

E.name: Powder Keg

effects.description: Passive: Gangplank periodically stocks a Powder Keg, up to a maximum of 3.
Active: Gangplank places a Powder Keg at the target location for 25 seconds, which connects to other nearby Powder Kegs with overlapping connection radius.

Gangplank and his enemies can attack the Powder Keg with basic attacks, dealing 1 damage per hit. Gangplank may also shoot the barrel with Parrrley. If Gangplank scores the killing blow, it explodes, also triggering a chain reaction that explodes nearby connected kegs with a 0.3-delay between explosions. If killed by an enemy, the keg is safely dismantled.

An exploding keg grants sight of its explosion radius for 2 seconds and deals the attack's damage to all enemies within the area, plus bonus physical damage against champions, ignoring 40% of each enemy's armor, as well as slowing and revealing them for 2 seconds. Enemies can only be damaged once per chain.

Attacking a keg with Spellblade will consume the effect. If Gangplank applies it, the keg will store the damage it would have dealt and add it to the explosion damage as bonus physical damage if it is the initial detonation of a chain.
Barrel deterioration speed increases at levels 7 and 13.

E.notes:
Placed barrels do not grant  vision until they explode, but they are revealed to Gangplank.
If Gangplank loses allied vision, for instance due to  nearsight, he will also lose vision on his barrels temporarily.
Barrels prematurely grant  sight of their explosion radius (including across terrain and into bushes) if  Parrrley or a lit fuse is travelling towards them.
This area reveal happens even if  Parrrley is not going to make it explode.
An exploding Powder Keg will splash  Parrrley's bonus damage, and will also be modified if the attack  critically strikes.
Attacks against Powder Kegs will apply on-hit effects (such as  Tiamat's Cleave), but  proc damage against the barrel itself is reduced to 0.
Damage from on-hit effects will not increase the damage of the explosion.
 Spellblade is a special-cased exception.
Notes regarding the  Spellblade interaction:
The attack with Spellblade can be but does not have to be the one to trigger the explosion.
The stored damage is static and will not change if Gangplank gains base attack damage by leveling up or exchanges his Spellblade item.
If a keg that is storing Spellblade damage is attacked with a new instance of Spellblade, it will override the previously stored damage (if different).
The magic damage of  Lich Bane is fully applied, but effectively converted to physical damage.
 Dead Man's Plate's Crushing Blow will not trigger from Powder Kegs destroyed from Gangplank, even with  Parrrley.
E.blurb: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.

R.name: Cannon Barrage

effects.description: Active: Gangplank shoots a flare into the air, signaling his ship off-shore to fire upon the target location for 8 seconds, calling down 12 waves of cannonballs in clusters of 3 every 2 seconds, and granting sight of the area for the duration. Each wave deals magic damage to all enemies within the area and slows them by 30% for 0.5 seconds.
Gangplank can purchase upgrades for his ship in the store at the cost of 500 Silver Serpents each, which improve Cannon Barrage:
Death's Daughter: An initial cannonball lands in the center of the barrage, dealing a cluster's worth of true damage to all enemies within the impact and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

leveling.attribute: Total Magic Damage withFire at Will
Maximum Mixed Total Damage withFire at Will and Death's Daughter

effects.description: Raise Morale: The barrage grants allies 30% bonus movement speed while they are inside the area, persisting for 2 seconds after leaving it.
Fire at Will: Cannon Barrage fires[ 6 additional waves ][ 2 additional clusters ] over its duration.

R.notes: Cannon Barrage's slow lingers for 0.25 seconds after affected enemies leave the target area.
R.blurb: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

lore: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take it—and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take it—and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.

skins.name: Sailor
skins.lore:
O, Bilgewater has been my home,
Since last time I was sailing!
But I'll not stay another day,
I'd sooner be out whaling.\\n

skins.name: Toy Soldier
skins.lore: Gangplank is a model soldier in the toy army, racking up an impressive array of victories against the dolls and stuffed animals. He hopes to one day be named Toy General, leading his troops into glorious battle.

skins.name: Special Forces
skins.lore: How special are the special forces? Let's put it this way: they're the only unit in the military with unlimited access to oranges.

skins.name: Sultan
skins.lore: Gangplank is a ruler from a distant land, and tales of his battle prowess and flowing red beard have reached even the farthest-flung city-states. As all rulers from distant lands, he also sports a snappy hat.

skins.name: Captain
skins.lore: Gangplank was a legendary murderer and cutthroat, prior to having his ship blown up while he was still on it. The silhouette of his famed captain's jacket is still burned into the memory of more than one unlucky sailor... with many convinced the man is somehow still alive.

skins.name: Dreadnova
skins.lore: Once a high ranking admiral in the Royal Space Military, Gangplank's reign of terror began when he stole and proliferated blueprints for a former colleague's experimental superweapon. Ending a thousand-year civil war in an instant, he defected with a massive armed battalion and formed the interplanetary criminal network known as the Dreadnova Corps.

skins.name: Pool Party

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.lore: Gangplank is the self-crowned King of the Grill, but his summer bod is the real life of the party. There should be a law against those abs.

skins.name: FPX

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.lore: Honoring GimGoon's winning performance as Gangplank during the 2019 World Championship.
